name: Escape the Tower!
description:
Description:

A block pushing puzzler made in 4 days. Game Jam Game.

Imprisoned inside a tall tall tower, you make your escape by clearing all of the puzzles that are placed on every floor.

Credits:

  • Synty Studios - Polygon Dungeon Pack
  • Synty Studios - Polygon Knights Pack
  • Synty Studios - ParticleFX Pack
  • Synty Studios - Simple Dungeons Pack
  • Meshtint Studio - Male Archer Pack

  • David Stenfors - Animated Loading Icons
